name: Dead Metal
description:
Dead Metal is a 1-4 player co op roguelike where you take control of a squad filled with humanities only hope, Dead Metal Suits. Robotics melded with psionic power capable of mass destruction as well as the ability to organically learn. Proceed through randomly generated levels filled with enemies secrets and most importantly loot. Build up your squad and build more prototype suits to replace the fallen, unlock new abilities by testing out different stat combinations to discover new play styles.

---FIGHT---

-Fight against hordes of both human and alien enemies as you seek to master the use of new technology
-Unleash a wide array of unique abilities to vanquish your enemies
-Use positioning to your advantage as you line up enemies for attacks while dodging the enemy attack patterns



---UPGRADE---

-Unlock new passive stats on your robots by finding rare ore out in the universe
-Get to the max level of 10 in order to see a Dead Metal Suits full potential



---CRAFT---

-Modify your weapons using currency in an attempt to make the best gear in the galaxy
-Collect rare currency to use the top modifications for your loot
